text_block_list.text: (…Woooooaaaaaaah!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin, bakushin, bakushiiin!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Bakushin O is in the lead! Sakura Bakushin O is leading!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Onwaaaaards!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: And she leads herself straight to first place!! Sakura Bakushin O is the Sprinters Stakes' new champion!
(Wooooaaaaahhh…)
(chirp chirp)
Early morning. I'd gone to the training course and saw Sakura Bakushin O running. She seemed to be training on her own.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Uoooooohhhh! ! Bakushin bakushin bakushiiiiin!!
She ran even faster than in my dream. She really is the best sprinter I've ever seen…!
On the other hand, it likely means she can't demonstrate her true abilities at distances that don't match her. However―

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Haa… Hah… Fyaah～! That takes care of that for the day! Good job, class rep! You can do it if you try!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: 'scuse me, Ms. Sakura Bakushin O! How would you feel about ruling the sprint world with me?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I appreciate your offer, and I'm sorry! I'm afraid I must decline!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I am the shining example, the class president!
Sakura Bakushin O's will was firm. As a trainer, I want to respect her wishes, but I'm at a bit of a loss…
In my brooding, the whole day had passed, and when I visited the track again…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That is to say, you wish me, the class rep, to provide you a few running tips!! You wish for guidance! Isn't that right!?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eh, eh…?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Well, Rice was just t-talking to herself… saying "Ms. Bakushin O is so fast…"…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: There's no need to be shy!! I am the reliable class president!! You can rely on me! Go on! Go go!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Um, umm, but… if you spend too much time with Rice, bad things are bound to come to Ms. Bakushin O…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …You won't? Rely on me?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Is that so… You won't rely on the class president, I see…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Not a single question…? I see…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: H-Hawawa…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Umm… maybe Rice would like to know the trick to victory…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm so glad you asked!!!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Fuhyaa!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The class president will teach you the secret to absolute victory! That is, of course — speed!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: S-Speed…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Think about it, Ms. Rice. How do you win a race?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: By reaching the finish faster than anyone else!! Isn't that right!?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-Yes, you're right…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: In other words, speed is power! Running faster than anyone else! Any time, every time! Run in the lead, closer to the goal than anyone else!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Overwhelming speed is the key to victory!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I see…!?
… At first I thought she was talking nonsense. But—
Her obsession with speed, her near absolute faith in it- It may just be what supports her explosive running.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Well, I did a good thing! Good class presidenting makes me feel great!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ……Huwahh!? You again!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hmm…? Say, why are you staring at me in silence?
"Surpass everyone with overwhelming speed". If we could push that as far as it will go…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin, bakushin, bakushiiin!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Bakushin O is in the lead! Sakura Bakushin O is leading!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Onwaaaards!!
Maybe, possibly, just conceivably…!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Say? Say, say, say! Were you not looking for anything in particular…?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: All the trainers I spoke to after yesterday tried to lead me astray with talk of "giving up on long distances" and "aptitudes"…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: If you're like that, I can tell you I will refuse!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes?!
choice_data_list: We go for the pinnacle of speed together!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: P-pinnacle of speed…?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer, you mean… To command every race with speed!! Is that it!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As class president!! Every race!! Is that what you're trying to do?!?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushiiiiin!! Those are the words I've been waiting for!! My trainer!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Starting tomorrow then, I'll be counting on you for guidance and encouragement!!
… This is how I succeeded in scouting Sakura Bakushin O.
